category-def.name: category.saker.build.system
category-def.label: Saker.build system
category-def.description: Plug-ins for Eclipse to use the saker.build system.

category-def.name: category.saker.build.ide.config
category-def.label: IDE configuration support with saker.build
category-def.description: Plug-ins for Eclipse to support project configuration based on the results of build executions.
